description: Skill entity field mapping with file upload support
notes: âœ¨ This is for AgentSkill (entity), not AgentSkillRelation (relationship)
Contains complete skill data including metadata, configuration, and business fields
- agid, skid: Belong in AgentSkillRelation (relationship table)

Schema fields: askid, owner, name, description, version, level, config, diagram, flowgram, langgraph, tags, examples, inputModes, outputModes, apps, limitations, path, source, status, price, price_model, public, rentable, created_at, updated_at
source field: Comma-separated list of relative file paths under the skill directory. Cloud returns presigned URLs for uploading these files.
